name: The Postman Project
description:
"On the verge of being fired, you decide to read people's private correspondance, choose who will receive each letter and manipulate their daily lives. Be the witness of their stories!"

Last year, our small team worked on this prototype for a couple of weeks and it is now finally available both in English and in French!

Made by:

Etienne COUTURIER - programmer - http://www.couturieretienne.fr/;

Gabin JIRODET - narrative designer - https://twitter.com/gabjir;

Marjorie MILHE-POUTINGON - producer - Milhe.marjorie@gmail.com;

Elie TOMMASI - additional programmer - http://tommasielie.wixsite.com/portfolio.
